column1: Kata Robata////You must go and try the Spicy Soy Ramen!  I now have my husband and sister addicted.  I drive from Friendswood regularly because I totally crave it.  And if you don't finish it all and want it "to go"
column2: they separate the liquid from the noodles so that they won't get soggy.  Genius!  Thank you Kata Robata - this helps me enjoy you 2 days in a row!  Next time I may just get a whole separate order of it to go!
